nars.task

Class MeterTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.budget.BudgetedHandle
      • nars.budget.Budget
        • nars.budget.UnitBudget
          • nars.budget.Item<Task>
            • nars.task.AbstractTask
              • nars.task.MutableTask
                • nars.task.MeterTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, java.util.function.Supplier<Task>, Budgeted, BudgetedStruct, Task, Tasked, Temporal, Termed, Stamp, Truthed

    public abstract class MeterTask
extends MutableTask
    Task which is specifically for collecting statistics about its budget dynamics across time and reacting to lifecycle events which are empty stubs in its super-classes
